messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Greetings!
messages.msgSnippet: Conference went great. I caught the post=conference crd, so I m laid up now. Have you looked into NCUnschoolers@yahoogroups.com ? BUSY, active group. ~Kelly
messages.messageBody:
Conference went great. I caught the post=conference crd, so I'm laid up
now.

Have you looked into NCUnschoolers@yahoogroups.com ? BUSY, active group.

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org

-----Original Message-----
From: Miltsov <miltsov1@...>

What a pity we'll be missing (have missed?) the unschooling conference
in NC by
a couple of days!

We're an unschooling family living in Montreal: Layla, Sasha, and
daughter
Liouba (9 years).
Liouba and I (Layla) will be in the Durham (Duke University) area next
week,
where I'll be giving a paper at a conference and Liouba will be hooking
up with
friends. We'd be happy to meet any unschoolers in the area and join in
some
activities or events or simply meeting new people.

Also, we'll be happy to get any tips on what's interesting to do or see
(we'll
try to catch a day or two at the ocean as well), so any suggestions and
company
will be welcome.

How did the conference go?

You are welcome to contact me through the list or e-mail miltsov1 at
yahoo dot
com
All the best and till soon,
Layla

messages.subject: Greetings!
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings everyone! What a pity we ll be missing (have missed?) the unschooling conference in NC by a couple of days! We re an unschooling family living in
messages.messageBody:
Greetings everyone!

What a pity we'll be missing (have missed?) the unschooling conference in NC by a couple of days!

We're an unschooling family living in Montreal: Layla, Sasha, and daughter Liouba (9 years).
Liouba and I (Layla) will be in the Durham (Duke University) area next week, where I'll be giving a paper at a conference and Liouba will be hooking up with friends. We'd be happy to meet any unschoolers in the area and join in some activities or events or simply meeting new people.

Also, we'll be happy to get any tips on what's interesting to do or see (we'll try to catch a day or two at the ocean as well), so any suggestions and company will be welcome.

How did the conference go?

You are welcome to contact me through the list or e-mail miltsov1 at yahoo dot com
All the best and till soon,
Layla

www.miltsov.org
